mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_sys_file(id, fk_rel_id,file_name,file_format,file_type,file_num,file_desc,remark,file_real_name,file_path,file_size, fk_project_id,added_by,added_by_name,added_time, last_modified_by,last_modified_by_name,last_modified_time,last_modified_ip,valid)
select #{obj.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{obj.fkRelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{obj.fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{obj.fileFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{obj.fileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{obj.fileNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{obj.fileDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{obj.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{obj.fileRealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{obj.filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{obj.fileSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{obj.fkProjectId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{obj.addedBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{obj.addedByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{obj.addedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{obj.lastModifiedBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{obj.lastModifiedByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{obj.lastModifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{obj.lastModifiedIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{obj.valid,jdbcType=INTEGER} from dual
